What is Burglary?

Burglary (also called breaking and entering or sometimes housebreaking) is a crime, the essence of which is illegal entry into a building for the purposes of committing an offense. Usually that offense will be theft, but most jurisdictions specify others which fall within the ambit of burglary.

Burglary can happen to anyone at any time. Burglary can be one of the most intrusive crimes. Not only does a burglar invade your personal space, but a lot of times they take items that are most important to you or family. Most things can be replaced such as electronics and material items, but a burglary really affects a family when they {% content_spinner "fcs2" "destroy items|steal irreplaceable items|take heirlooms|destroy family heirlooms" %} that truly mean something. It’s important to {% content_spinner "burglary1" "protect|secure|get security for" %} your home and be prepared at all times no matter what the situation is.
